title: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: (1) The date/time value is not being correctly validated upon entry.
EB: (2) The date value should be validated by the UI or Model to ensure it conforms to a valid format.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the BIRT report designer.
2. Create a new 'DateTime' type report parameter.
3. In the 'default value' field, type in an invalid date string, e.g. '55/66/9999'.
